headline: Gartner® Recognizes Conifers as the Company to Beat in the Report "AI Vendor Race: Conifers Is the Company to Beat in AI SOC Agents for Threat Investigation," December 2025
summary: Gartner research talks about “Conifers’ ability to dynamically learn client-specific institutional knowledge resolves the critical challenge where conventional automation typically fails to incorporate proprietary context.”DALLAS, Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Conifers.ai, the agentic AI SOC platform transforming modern Security Operations Centers (SOCs), today announced it is recognized as the Company to Beat in the 8 December 2025 Gartner® report, "AI Vendor Race: Conifers Is the Company t
